summary: A young American woman Susan Roberts goes to the south of France to do her thesis research on a recently deceased composer, staying with his eccentric relatives.
cast: Stefanie Powers|James Olson|Margaretta Scott|Jane Lapotaire|Joss Ackland|Kirsten Lindholm
keywords: murder of a nude woman|nudity|giallo|bikini giallo|psychotronic film
title: Concierto inacabado
